starters.title: Start here
starters.description: Set out on your journey by building your own website, then move on to multiplayer games and collaborative web apps.

react.title: React
react.description: Learn to use one of the most popular JavaScript frameworks on the web.

ml.title: Machine Learning
ml.description: Learn how to make machines learn with these fun projects!

arduino.title: Arduino
arduino.description: Bring projects from cyberspace to the real world with this small hardware platform.

experimental.title: Experimental
experimental.description: As is/no warranty. These workshops haven’t been fully tested yet, so we don’t know just will happen if you try building things with them.

misc.title: Miscellaneous
misc.description: The odd ones out. Workshops not yet properly categorized.

retired.title: Retired
retired.description: These workshops are no longer maintained. They may contain errors and are not recommended for club use. Here be dragons.
